Data Science guidance session logs Overview DSgs-guide team members R session information

Data Science guidance session logs Leonardo Collado-Torres Overview This website contains the public logs for the Data Science guidance sessiones carried out by the R/Bioconductor-powered Team Data Science at LIBD. DSgs-guide team members Arta Seyedian Joshua M. Stolz Louise Huuki Nicholas J. Eagles Madhavi Tippani This book was last updated on 2021-03-04 18:04:16. R session information Details on the R version used for making this book. The source code is available at lcolladotor/DSgs_logs. ## Packages used in the book library("ggplot2") library("lubridate") library("dplyr") library("here") ## Load the package at the top of your script library("sessioninfo") ## graphs.html
1 Graphs

1 Graphs Below we see the number of DSgs sessions across weeks for each of the guides for each type of help/guidance request over the last four weeks. As a team, we can see the number of requests we’ve addressed over the weeks. Finally, we can check if the overall number of help requests we’ve attended as the weeks have gone by. These graphs are partially based on lcolladotor/mphtasessions.

4 Leo 4.1 Person_11 4.1.1 2021-01-11 Help request Questions related to accessing results from the DG paper by Andrew Jaffe Notes NA 4.2 Person_13 4.2.1 2020-11-03 Help request Fixed a bug on biocthis for release branches Notes GitHub issue at biocthis 4.3 Person_17 4.3.1 2020-11-03 Help request Issue with knitcitations Notes GitHub issue at biocthis ### 2020-11-25 Help request Accesing CMC RNA-seq data Notes Started PsychENCODE access request process 4.4 Person_18 4.4.1 2021-01-14 Help request biocthis macOS GHA bug Notes BioC Support website answer 4.5 Person_27 4.5.1 2020-10-30 Help request Issue with JHPCE file permissions Notes Explained the chgrp and umask commands plus ~/.bashrc file configuration. I also mentioned why we don’t use chmod 777 at JHPCE. Details on Slack (private channel). 4.6 Person_28 4.6.1 2020-10-30 Help request recount3 GTEx data access Notes BioC Support website answer 4.7 Person_29 4.7.1 2020-10-21 Help request Ballgown stattest Notes BioC Support website answer 4.8 Person_4 4.8.1 2020-11-11 Help request Differences between recount2’s “bp_length” and SPEAQeasy’s “Length” Notes Check Slack helpdesk channel 4.9 Person_5 4.9.1 2020-11-03 Help request Fixed two bugs on recount3 related to locate_url() for the BigWig files. Notes Resulted in recount3 versions 1.1.1 and 1.1.2 on bioc-devel (and 1.0.2 on bioc-release) ### 2020-11-11 Help request GitHub actions workflow issue with macOS on R-devel Notes GitHub issue at biocthis 4.10 Person_8 4.10.1 2020-10-28 Help request exceRpt pipeline counts Notes BioC Support website answer

5 Louise 5.1 Person_12 5.2 Person_16 5.3 Person_17 5.4 Person_21 5.5 Person_24 5.6 Person_28 5.7 Person_31 5.8 Person_33 5.9 Person_34 5.10 Person_36 5.11 Person_4 5.12 Person_7

5 Louise 5.1 Person_12 5.1.1 2020-11-05 Help request LC repo organization Notes We discussed organizing by analysis (a directory for each one, then prehaps sub- directory for data & plots) Create a readMe for each sub-folder. Use gitignore to keep repo from getting too big. 5.2 Person_16 5.2.1 2021-02-09 Help request Visualizing RPKM valus for genes in Humna and Primarte data Notes We spent time doing basic Rstudio setup and troubleshooting, and got the data downloaded 5.3 Person_17 5.3.1 2020-11-12 Help request Help adapting ggplot script for TWAS Z-score Notes We talked about how the data should be structured before using ggplot (transforming some data and adding catagorical columns) 5.4 Person_21 5.4.1 2021-01-27 Help request group_by bug for get_mean_ratio Notes We are going to try an iterative strategy to keep tables smaller 5.5 Person_24 5.5.1 2020-11-18 Help request Help clustering sce data Notes We debugged some code and ultimetly decided that it might be best for Abby to write new code and use the tsne function to cluster and plot the data 5.6 Person_28 5.6.1 2020-11-13 Help request Using reshape package to transform table for plotting Notes I recomended using dcast to do a “long” to “wide” data transformation ### 2020-12-08 Help request Resolving issues in phenotype data between genotype, expression, and LIBDpheno Notes Need to resolve swap bugs. Plan to create a table of phenotype data (Dx, age, sex, race) for each BrNum to mach genotype data 5.7 Person_31 5.7.1 2020-10-27 Help request Plotly help if possible? I’m trying to export an html file that allows the user to look at each snp/gene on the plot, and I am almost successful. Leo recommended that I talk to you on this matter. Notes Needed to use highlight_key and highlight functions to select points between plots. Used rstats example as guide https://gist.github.com/lcolladotor/350ac8843e153d135f64880a1d029b14 5.8 Person_33 5.8.1 2021-02-04 Help request Github ssh key set up Notes We got the ssh keys working for Brenda’s github 5.9 Person_34 5.9.1 2020-10-20 Help request Help with spatstat Notes spatstat package https://spatstat.org/releasenotes/spatstat-1.39-0.html, L function https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/spatstat/versions/1.64-1/topics/Lest Kmark https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/spatstat/versions/1.64-1/topics/Kmark 5.10 Person_36 5.10.1 2020-10-21 Help request Question: Subset center regions of a set of different length sequences Notes BioC Support website answer 5.11 Person_4 5.11.1 2020-12-07 Help request jhpce set up on mac Notes Went through the setting up passwordless login for jhpce using ssh keys, and coppied the configuration files from https://gist.github.com/lcolladotor/3b1063db30a206835ee7e086c8f037ee 5.12 Person_7 5.12.1 2021-02-04 Help request Work on habenula deconvolution and debug the deconvolution package Notes We went over applying DeconvoBuddies functions to hebenula data

6 Maddy 6.1 Person_12 6.1.1 2020-11-19 Help request download matlab on local computer through JHU software portal Notes NA 6.2 Person_17 6.2.1 2020-11-04 Help request 3D volume extraction in Matlab Notes https://www.mathworks.com/matlabcentral/answers/636365-how-can-i-measure-volume-from-a-3d-image?s_tid=srchtitle 6.3 Person_20 6.3.1 2020-12-03 Help request how to open matlab (GUI and command line) on JHPCE Notes NA 6.4 Person_22 6.4.1 2020-12-03 Help request run dotdotdot pipeline local computer and cluster Notes got through the Github vignettes thoroughly 6.5 Person_26 6.5.1 2020-10-28 Help request customize dotdotdot to his data Notes NA 6.6 Person_30 6.6.1 2020-11-19 Help request data transfer from LIBD server to JHPCE Notes to use rsync or scp, you need to have user account created on LIBD server (Bill can help create it) 6.7 Person_35 6.7.1 2021-02-12 Help request download repository from github to cluster and run dotdotdot on cluster Notes NA 6.8 Person_37 6.8.1 2021-02-05 Help request JHPCE ssh keypair set up Notes We got Heena’s MAC registered for passwordless login to JHPCE 6.9 Person_4 6.9.1 2021-02-05 Help request dotdotdot parameter tuning for Ema’s rat RNAscope data Notes NA 6.10 Person_5 6.10.1 2020-12-01 Help request how to connect to LIBD servers on windows and mac Notes NA

7 Nick 7.1 Person_1 7.1.1 2020-10-21 Help request Question: Cannot Install gmapR Bioconductor Package Notes BioC Support website answer ### 2020-11-11 Help request How does one modify a single value of a field in a seqinfo object? Notes *BioC Support website answer 7.2 Person_10 7.2.1 2020-11-04 Help request Extracting Sequences from Fasta Files with Rsamtools Notes BioC Support website answer 7.3 Person_14 7.3.1 2020-12-09 Help request Help with importing HDF5 file Notes Used ‘h5ls’ command from shell to verify contents of file; eventually found we were looking at the wrong file (error message was cryptic about issue). https://jhu-genomics.slack.com/archives/CUYHWV7AA/p1607034309074800 7.4 Person_15 7.4.1 2021-03-03 Help request Advice for writing papers Notes We discussed how Sciwheel can be adapted for different journals, and provided general advice for getting started and formatting a paper for a particular journal. 7.5 Person_17 7.5.1 2020-10-26 Help request Help running speakeasy on MARCC and JHPCE please Notes NA ### 2020-11-20 Help request ChipQC ‘names’ attribute [9] must be the same length as the vector [2]’ Notes *BioC Support website answer ### 2021-02-23 Help request I need help with setting up Mobaexterm. Unable to open new terminals and folder permission issues Notes I hadn’t encountered the issue with new local terminals failing to open. I planned to follow up with better specific advice via email, and offer to explain this advice in a future DSGS. 7.6 Person_2 7.6.1 2021-03-02 Help request Our group’s set-up and approach for writing papers with google docs, and managing citations Notes I went through the setup and example usage of Sciwheel and cross reference, and gave general advice (it’s often easiest to start with the “Methods” section, etc) 7.7 Person_23 7.7.1 2020-01-06 Help request Correlation values from labeledHeatmap Notes *BioC Support website answer 7.8 Person_3 7.8.1 2020-10-28 Help request issue running spaceranger Notes initial issue seemed to do with the spaceranger command arguments; we are continuining to investigate possible module issues or insufficient code in the blog post 7.9 Person_38 7.9.1 2021-02-25 Help request I need help in: downloading data from SRA to JHPCE, running SPEAQeasy to create rse object (one session will likely not be enough). Notes I explained how to use SPEAQeasy at JHPCE, and we tried an experimental method for downloading SRA data. The method didn’t work, and we plan to meet again after I verify a more typical method works. 7.10 Person_4 7.10.1 2020-11-02 Help request Help with SpaceRanger Notes NA 7.11 Person_5 7.11.1 2021-03-02 Help request Clarification about how recent CMC data was processed with SPEAQeasy Notes I explained that SPEAQeasy was used for the recent hg38 processing, and an older version of a similar pipeline was used for the original hg19 processing. We discussed our new method for retrieving gene symbols ("org.*.eg.db" packages) and some general code advice. 7.12 Person_9 7.12.1 2020-10-28 Help request Changing Row Names of MultiAssayExperiment Assay Notes BioC Support website answer ### 2020-12-02 Help request Matching Variants Between Two VCF Objects Notes *BioC Support website answer
